recipe.title: Green Salad with Mustard Vinaigrette
ingredients: 8 cups mixed greens such as mesclun or a mix of romaine and Boston and Bibb lettuces
instructions: Whisk together vinegar, mustard, sugar, 3/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a large bowl. Add oil in a slow stream, whisking until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper. Add lettuce and toss to coat.
